scripts.release:check: npm run release:check:fe && npm run release:check:be
scripts.release:check:fe: npm --prefix apps/web run build && npm --prefix apps/web run typecheck && npm --prefix apps/web run test
scripts.release:check:be: npm --prefix apps/api run lint && npm --prefix apps/api run typecheck && npm --prefix apps/api run build && npm --prefix apps/api run test
scripts.ci:build: npm --prefix apps/web run build && npm --prefix apps/api run build
scripts.ci:typecheck: npm --prefix apps/web run typecheck && npm --prefix apps/api run typecheck
scripts.ci:test: npm --prefix apps/web run test && npm --prefix apps/api run test
